posts.message:
An Innovative Heathcare Technology Company is Hiring a Qualified Caliber :

Title : (Technical Lead)

Responsibilities :

- Guide team development efforts towards successful project delivery.
- Maintain high standards of software quality within the team by establishing good practices and habits.
- Collaborate with team leads and software architect to plan, design, develop, test, and maintain web- and desktop-based business applications built on Microsoft technologies.
- Assist in the collection and documentation of user's requirements, development of user stories, estimates and work plans.
- Prepare reports, manuals and other documentation on the status, operation and maintenance of software.
- Design, develop, and unit test applications in accordance with established standards.
- Package and support deployment of releases.
- Develop, refine, and tune integrations between applications.
- Analyze and resolve technical and application problems.
- Adhere to high-quality development principles while delivering solutions on-time and on-budget.
- Provide third-level support to business users.

Job Requirements :
- BSc in Computer Science or similar field
- 6+ years of experience
- Experience in Microsoft .NET web development is a must
- Experience in Javascript development is a plus.

To Apply please send your CV at ( Christina.saber@drbridge.com ) with “Technical Lead” in the Subject.

Saudi Arabia job Opportunity: Mobile Developer needed in KSA government sector 
- Minimum 1 year experience.
- Native: Android & iOs  
مطلوب مطور برامج موبايل في السعودية قطاع حكومي 

Send your CV TO naadydev@gmail.com

An Innovative Heathcare Technology Company is Hiring a Qualified Caliber :

Title : (Software Developer)

Basic Functions:

• Perform translation of designs into software, development of code, documentation, and software testing
• Perform modification of software, fixing software “bugs” in existing code, and troubleshooting issues on production and test systems.

Principal areas of activity:

• Modify existing software to adapt it to new hardware and improve the performance.
• Design and develop software systems.
• Analyze information, determine, recommend and plan installation of a new system or modification of an existing system.
• Develop software system testing and validation procedures.
• Plan software programming and development of documentation.
• Consult with customers, other departments on project status, proposals and technical issues.
• Store, retrieve and manipulate data for analysis of system capabilities and requirements.
Key Measurement:
• 2+ years’ experience writing web application in .NET
• Strong knowledge in HTML and CSS
• Strong knowledge in SQL Server development.
• Strong knowledge in ECMA JavaScript
• Strong knowledge in jQuery is a required
• familiarity with ASP.NET MVC is a required
• familiarity with Entity Framework is a plus
• familiarity with Web Service, XML and JSON is a plus
